question:
Which among the following poems was/ were written by Henry Louis Vivian Derozio?
1. The Fakeer of Jungheera
2. To India- My Native Land
3. The Harp of India
4. Song of the Hindoostani Minstrel
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Poems written by Henry Louis Vivian Derozio- To India- My Native Land (1828), The Fakeer of Jungheera (1829), The Harp of India, Song of the Hindoostani Minstrel (1827).
